stateCompliance.headline: California Cash Advance Laws for Irvine Residents
stateCompliance.content: Irvine residents in Orange County are protected by California's comprehensive Deferred Deposit Transaction Law. The California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI) regulates payday lenders to ensure compliance with strict borrower protections and fee limits.
keyPoints: Maximum loan: $300 total including all fees (typical $255 cash with $45 fee)
Maximum fee: 15% of check amount, maximum $45
APR range: Approximately 460% for standard 14-day loans
One loan policy: Can only have one payday loan at a time
No rollovers: Cannot extend loans for additional fees
No criminal prosecution: Lenders cannot threaten or pursue criminal action
Single NSF charge: Only one $15 fee per bounced check
Full transparency: All fees disclosed in dollars and APR before signing
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI)
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is for general educational purposes and does not constitute legal advice. Payday loan laws may change. For the most current information, contact the DFPI at 1-866-275-2677 or dfpi.ca.gov. For specific legal questions, consult a California attorney. Individual lender terms vary within state law limits.

faq.question: Where is your Irvine location?
faq.answer: We're located at 2675 Irvine Center Drive, Suite 220, in the Irvine Spectrum shopping center. Take I-405 Exit 57 toward Irvine Center. Excellent parking available.

faq.question: What do I need to bring to get a cash advance?
faq.answer: Bring a valid government ID, recent pay stub or bank statement for income verification, and your active checking account information. Approval typically takes 30 minutes.

faq.question: What's the maximum loan amount in California?
faq.answer: California law limits payday loans to $300 total. This includes the cash you receive plus all fees. Most borrowers receive $255 cash with a $45 fee.

faq.question: How quickly can I get approved in Irvine?
faq.answer: Most applicants at our Spectrum location receive approval and cash within 30 minutes. We have a quick verification process for your convenience.

faq.question: What are all the fees upfront?
faq.answer: California requires full fee disclosure. The maximum fee is 15% of your check amount. All costs are stated clearly in dollars and APR before you sign.
